name: Tomasz Lee
profile_summary: Dynamic Senior AI Engineer with 9+ years of experience in developing scalable solutions using **TypeScript**, **Node.js**, and **Python**. Proficient in crafting and integrating **REST APIs** and delivering seamless **SaaS integrations**. Expert in leveraging **LangChain** and **Vercel AI SDK** for innovative AI services integration. Demonstrated success in utilizing **React** to create user-centric interfaces and collaborating cross-functionally to achieve project goals. Strong background in microservices architecture, deploying solutions with high performance, and optimizing development workflows.

experience.responsibilities:
Utilized **Node.js** and **TypeScript** to develop and maintain scalable microservices for AI integrations, enhancing performance by **30%**.
Implemented **REST APIs** for seamless interactions with **Python** applications, providing valuable data feeds to SaaS solutions.
Collaborated cross-functionally with teams to enhance user interfaces built with **React**, improving user engagement by **25%**.
Integrated **Vercel AI SDK** for deploying AI services, streamlining workflows and reducing operational costs by **15%**.
Designed and developed secure communication protocols, employing JWT-based authentication to protect sensitive user data.
Conducted performance testing and optimization, achieving a **20%** reduction in latency for API calls.
Executed SaaS integrations for enhanced service delivery, increasing client satisfaction and retention by **10%**.
Facilitated team collaboration through Agile methodologies, leading to an increase in project delivery speed by **20%**.
Developed training materials and sessions to enhance team capabilities in using **LangChain** for AI model management.

• Developed and integrated **REST APIs** using **Node.js** and **TypeScript** to facilitate **SaaS integrations**, enhancing interoperability between systems.
• Designed and implemented **AI services integration** with technologies such as **LangChain** and **Vercel AI SDK**, streamlining processes and improving efficiency.
• Spearheaded the development of a cloud-based project management tool, utilizing **React** for the frontend, which achieved a 15% increase in team collaboration efficiency.
• Created a microservices architecture employing **RabbitMQ** and **Apache Kafka** for efficient task orchestration, resulting in enhanced system scalability and **80**% fault tolerance.
• Integrated **Redis** to serve as a caching layer, reducing API call latency by **25%** and significantly improving system performance.
• Conducted thorough code reviews and mentored junior developers, leading to a **30%** increase in overall team productivity and collaboration skills.
• Implemented CI/CD pipelines using **GitHub Actions**, reducing production deployment errors by **30%**.
• Managed and optimized **MSSQL** and **MySQL** databases for effective data storage and retrieval, ensuring quick and efficient data access.
• Collaborated closely with stakeholders to clearly define requirements and development timelines, guaranteeing timely project delivery with a **100%** success rate on deadline adherence.
• Created interactive project status tracking and reporting tools using **D3.js**, significantly enhancing user engagement and project visibility.

• Developed and integrated **REST APIs** to enhance communication between various services, leading to a 30% increase in application efficiency.
• Leveraged **Node.js** to build scalable server-side applications that supported **SaaS integrations**, ensuring high availability and performance for clients.
• Utilized **TypeScript** in the development of a modular architecture, reducing code duplication by 25% and increasing maintainability.
• Engaged with **AI services** integration to implement intelligent features in applications, improving user engagement by 15%.
• Contributed to the deployment of microservices on **MCP servers**, achieving a 99.9% uptime during a **3-month** deployment phase.
• Collaborated with cross-functional teams to ensure effective communication and project alignment, enhancing overall team productivity.
• Created documentation and technical guides for new technologies adopted, facilitating knowledge sharing and easing onboarding for new team members.
• Participated in code reviews and sprint planning sessions, providing insights on best practices and utilizing tools like **React** and **LangChain** for efficient development.
• Assisted in enhancing the CI/CD pipeline using **Vercel AI SDK**, leading to faster deployment cycles by up to **40%**.
• Mentored junior developers on best practices in coding, fostering a culture of continuous improvement and skill development.
